DataElement.preferredName: Agent Weekly Quantity Prescription Total Milligram Dose
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the dose in milligrams of an agent prescribed during a 7 day period.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the amount of an agent prescribed during a 7 day period.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Every week.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A doctor's order for medicine or another intervention.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A verbal or written order given by an authorized person instructing a patient to obtain and use a medical device, prescription or undergo a procedure.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to COG for by script Thu Jan 2 10:00:57 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram or 1000 micrograms. One milligram equals approximately 0.015432 grain or 35.274 x 10E-6 ounce._The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the units of measure for assessment results and dosing.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:A measure of weight.  A milligram is approximately 450,000 times smaller than a pound and 28,000 times smaller than an ounce.:The amount of medicine taken, or radiation given, at one time.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A metric unit of mass equal to one thousandth of a gram or 1000 micrograms. One milligram equals approximately 0.015 432 grain or 35.274 x 10E-6 ounce.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
